author: yegor
msg: when a new RowRecord is created, the default row height shoud be 0xFF. The DEFAULT_HEIGHT_BIT (0x8000) is optional, some clients like OpenOffice 2.3 and earlier don't understand it

author: jeremias
msg: Fixed small mistake with weight adjustment on font lookup. Weight 400 was slipping through the cracks.

author: jeremias
msg: The FontEventListener was not wired into font auto-detection. An error while loading a font wasn't relayed to the event subsystem.

author: jeremias
msg: Skip IO Exception when loading a PFM and an AFM could be loaded. The PFM is only a fallback and not necessary when the AFM is available. Motivation: The "URW Bookman L" fonts from GhostScript have bad PFM files.
